creator: hubertus@groepper.com
text:
This is the third version of what is basically the same doc. One on the website, one for 1.2.x, and one 
for 1.4-dev. Also, this one here seems outdatet, recommending cocoon 2.1.5 instead of 2.1.6. It 
doesn't  contain recent changes to build.properties, either. I suggest to keep bug 32768 open and to 
find a way to sync at least INSTALL-SRc for the current stable version and the website instructions.

has been completely rewritten anyway. we should eventually work on some way to
link website docs and in-tree docs, but not now...
creator: nettings@apache.org
